attributes.action: move The Apprentice to another night of the week so that it doesn't clash with important football fixtures.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Football is the national sport and gives enjoyment to many people.

The Apprentice is a great TV programme, highlighting many of the skills necessary to be successful in business, whilst also providing entertainment.

Unfortunately, The Apprentice often clashes with football fixtures, not least of which being the European Champions League final.

It would bring relief to many to see the transmission day and time moved so that the football match could be enjoyed without having to dodge any hints of who had been 'fired' by Sir Alan Sugar.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
